00039 #ifndef LIBCURIE_IO_H
00040 #define LIBCURIE_IO_H
00041 
00042 #define IO_CHUNKSIZE 4096
00043 
00044 enum io_type {
00045   iot_undefined = 0,
00046   iot_read = 1,
00047   iot_write = 2
00048 };
00049 
00050 enum io_result {
00051   io_undefined = 0,
00052   io_end_of_file = 1,
00053   io_changes = 2,
00054   io_unrecoverable_error = 3,
00055   io_no_change = 4,
00056   io_complete = 5,
00057   io_incomplete = 6,
00058   io_finalising = 7
00059 };
00060 
00061 struct io {
00062     int fd;
00063     /*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ char *buffer;
00064     /* can't use a fixed buffer since we might need to read (or write)
00065        something larger */
00066 
00067     enum io_type   type;
00068     enum io_result status;
00069 
00070     unsigned int length;
00071     unsigned int position;
00072     unsigned int buffersize;
00073 };
00074 
00075 /*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct io *io_open (int);
00076 /*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct io *io_open_read (const char *);
00077 /*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct io *io_open_write (const char *);
00078 enum io_result io_write(/*@notnull@*/ struct io *, const char *, unsigned int);
00079 enum io_result io_collect(/*@notnull@*/ struct io *, const char *, unsigned int);
00080 enum io_result io_read(/*@notnull@*/ struct io *);
00081 enum io_result io_commit (/*@notnull@*/ struct io *);
00082 enum io_result io_finish (/*@notnull@*/ struct io *);
00083 void io_close (/*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct io *);
00084 
00085 #endif
